announcement_items.title: Employee Benefits Enrollment
announcement_items.body_html: Open enrollment for health insurance and retirement benefits is now available. Access your benefits portal to make changes.

announcement_items.title: Holiday Schedule Reminder
announcement_items.body_html: Please review the holiday schedule for winter break. Campus offices will operate on reduced hours.

announcement_items.title: Performance Review Process
announcement_items.body_html: Annual performance reviews are due by January 15th. Contact HR for assistance with the evaluation process.

onboarding_toolkit.image_alt: Onboarding toolkit for new HCCC faculty and staff
onboarding_toolkit.title: Onboarding Toolkit
onboarding_toolkit.intro_html: New to HCCC? Let us help you get set up. Follow these steps to access your email, program your office phone, and complete all of your onboarding forms.

hr_forms.title: Employee Information Update Form
hr_forms.description: Update your personal information and emergency contacts

hr_forms.title: Leave Request Form
hr_forms.description: Request vacation, sick leave, or personal time off

hr_forms.title: Benefits Enrollment Form
hr_forms.description: Enroll in health, dental, and retirement benefits

hr_forms.title: Direct Deposit Authorization
hr_forms.description: Set up or change your direct deposit information

contact_section.title: Get In Touch
contact_section.intro: Find the contact information you need for HR departments or for a specific HR staff member.
